long_desc: Custom report shows null values for calculated field 'Years of Service' for some workers.
solution_text: Check calculated field logic, ensure correct data sources and fallbacks; republish report. Steps: 1) Verify related Workday business process and data. 2) Check integrations/logs. 3) If needed, escalate to Reporting Team.

long_desc: Background check status stuck at 'Pending' for candidate Isha Gupta, causing delay in provisioning.
solution_text: Verify background vendor response, escalate to Talent Ops to clear hold, and complete provisioning tasks once cleared. Steps: 1) Verify related Workday business process and data. 2) Check integrations/logs. 3) If needed, escalate to Integrations Team.

long_desc: Timesheet save throws 'Validation error' when employee Priya Saxena tries to submit.
solution_text: Review timesheet rules, check custom validations, and if necessary bypass and submit manually. Steps: 1) Verify related Workday business process and data. 2) Check integrations/logs. 3) If needed, escalate to Integrations Team.

long_desc: Employee Neha Chatterjee shows negative leave balance after manager approval.
solution_text: Trigger absence recalculation, verify time off plan, and adjust accrual if required. Steps: 1) Verify related Workday business process and data. 2) Check integrations/logs. 3) If needed, escalate to Benefits Team.

long_desc: Studio integration for payroll file ingestion timeout with connector exception.
solution_text: Check connector configuration, increase timeout or split file, and review cloud connector status. Steps: 1) Verify related Workday business process and data. 2) Check integrations/logs. 3) If needed, escalate to Integrations Team.

short_desc: Pay slip not generated for contractor
long_desc: Monthly payslip missing for contractor Isha Iyer (Cont ID:167136).
solution_text: Validate pay groups and worker type; regenerate payslip and confirm payroll interface to payroll vendor. Steps: 1) Verify related Workday business process and data. 2) Check integrations/logs. 3) If needed, escalate to Payroll Team.

short_desc: Tax form upload failing for employee
long_desc: Employee cannot upload new tax document due to tenant validation error.
solution_text: Verify file size/type policies, clear cache, and allow alternate upload method if needed. Steps: 1) Verify related Workday business process and data. 2) Check integrations/logs. 3) If needed, escalate to Payroll Team.

long_desc: Custom Extend application crashes on load with 'TypeError' for some users.
solution_text: Review Extend app logs, fix client-side JS error, and redeploy the app. Steps: 1) Verify related Workday business process and data. 2) Check integrations/logs. 3) If needed, escalate to Security Team.

long_desc: Prompt on report doesn't filter by supervisory org as expected.
solution_text: Review prompt configuration, confirm prompt values mapping, and test with sample users. Steps: 1) Verify related Workday business process and data. 2) Check integrations/logs. 3) If needed, escalate to Integrations Team.

long_desc: Prompt on report doesn't filter by supervisory org as expected.

long_desc: Custom Extend application crashes on load with 'TypeError' for some users.
solution_text: Review Extend app logs, fix client-side JS error, and redeploy the app. Steps: 1) Verify related Workday business process and data. 2) Check integrations/logs. 3) If needed, escalate to Benefits Team.

long_desc: Work authorization records for international hire not attached to worker profile.
solution_text: Add work authorization via Maintain Work Authorization task and attach required documents. Steps: 1) Verify related Workday business process and data. 2) Check integrations/logs. 3) If needed, escalate to Workday Core Team.

long_desc: Mass compensation upload produced mismatched amounts for multiple employees.
solution_text: Validate mapping, roll back if necessary, and reprocess with corrected file. Steps: 1) Verify related Workday business process and data. 2) Check integrations/logs. 3) If needed, escalate to Benefits Team.

long_desc: Custom Extend application crashes on load with 'TypeError' for some users.
solution_text: Review Extend app logs, fix client-side JS error, and redeploy the app. Steps: 1) Verify related Workday business process and data. 2) Check integrations/logs. 3) If needed, escalate to Security Team.

long_desc: Compensation change stuck in approval chain and not progressing.
solution_text: Review approval delegation rules, reassign approver, and manually advance if necessary. Steps: 1) Verify related Workday business process and data. 2) Check integrations/logs. 3) If needed, escalate to Payroll Team.

short_desc: EIB upload failing with error code 500
long_desc: EIB scheduled job for mass worker update failing with HTTP 500 and no payload applied.
solution_text: Inspect integration logs, correct CSV formatting, re-run EIB with corrected file, and monitor Studio logs. Steps: 1) Verify related Workday business process and data. 2) Check integrations/logs. 3) If needed, escalate to Workday Core Team.

long_desc: Employee Karan Pandey shows negative leave balance after manager approval.
solution_text: Trigger absence recalculation, verify time off plan, and adjust accrual if required. Steps: 1) Verify related Workday business process and data. 2) Check integrations/logs. 3) If needed, escalate to Integrations Team.

long_desc: Employee updated benefits selection but enrollment still shows previous choices.
solution_text: Confirm transaction completed, check benefit effective dates, and reconcile benefits enrollment run. Steps: 1) Verify related Workday business process and data. 2) Check integrations/logs. 3) If needed, escalate to Workday Core Team.

short_desc: Salary not updated after compensation change

solution_text: Check compensation effective date, payroll processing schedule, and re-run payroll calculation for affected pay period. Steps: 1) Verify related Workday business process and data. 2) Check integrations/logs. 3) If needed, escalate to Payroll Team.
